headline: Is Southwest Airlines (LUV) Still Attractive After Strong 1-Year Share Price Gains?
summary: If you are wondering whether Southwest Airlines at around US$43.20 is still a sensible entry point or more of a hold, it helps to step back and look at what the recent price moves and current valuation are really telling you. Over the short term, the stock has returned 1.7% over the last 7 days, 4.9% over the last month, 4.6% year to date, and 33.2% over the last year. The 3 year return sits at 24.7% and the 5 year return at a 1.0% decline. Recent news around Southwest Airlines has focused...
